Area 3 – Interrogation enters tapped.
When Area 3 – Interrogation enters, create a copy of Interrogate. You may cast the copy. [i](It’s a {B} sorcery with “Target opponent reveals one or more cards from their hand. You choose one of them. They discard that card. For each card in their hand not revealed this way, they lose 1 life.”)[/i]
{T}: Add {B}.
